Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to its growth. Given its high value to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs and could provide substantial returns on your investment. We are confident that this product will meet your expectations and help you achieve your goals more efficiently. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
